title: Poor Rich feat. Michael Cerveris & Patrick Page
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Broadway stars Michael Cerveris (The Gilded Age, Fun Home) and Patrick Page (The Gilded Age, Hadestown) star in a Ukrainian folktale that shows there's more to wisdom than meets the eye.
